message.content:
cs.NI, cs.MM, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.CR

The paper discusses a resource allocation strategy for delivering video streams over eMBMS networks, which involves optimizing power transmission allocation to minimize user energy consumption. This topic falls under the domain of networked systems (cs.NI) and multimedia (cs.MM). The paper also mentions the use of Random Linear Network Coding (RLNC) for ensuring reliability, which is a technique used in information theory (cs.IT). Additionally, the proposed model involves optimizing the sleep period of users, which can be seen as a control systems (cs.SY) problem. Finally, the paper discusses the reduction of user energy footprint, which is a security and privacy (cs.CR) concern.
